docs.lead_paragraph: Hookah bars have been cropping up in immigrant enclaves and have made inroads in chic downtown areas. Now, college students are discovering their appeal.

headline.main: Collegians Smoking Hookahs ... Filled With Tobacco
headline.print_headline: Collegians Smoking Hookahs {hellip} Filled With Tobacco

docs.snippet: Hookah bars have been cropping up in immigrant enclaves and have made inroads in chic downtown areas. Now, college students are discovering their appeal.

docs.lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores, under pressure from critics who say that it pays poor wages and benefits, said yesterday that it planned to reduce employee co-payments for certain prescription drugs to $3 from $10. Wal-Mart said that its previously announced plan to halve the waiting period to one year for part-time employees to qualify for health care would take effect on May 13.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Says It Will Augment Employee Health Care Benefits

docs.abstract: Wal-Mart Stores, under fire from critics who say it pays poverty-level wages and provides only limited health care benefits, says it will reduce employee co-payments for certain prescription drugs to $3 from $10; says it will also offer health care coverage for children of eligible full- and part-time workers (S)

docs.lead_paragraph: Most prisons are notorious for the quality of their cuisine (pretty poor) and the behavior of their residents (pretty violent). They are therefore ideal locations to test a novel hypothesis: that violent aggression is largely a product of poor nutrition. Toward that end, researchers are studying whether inmates become less violent when put on a diet rich in vitamins and in the fatty acids found in seafood.

headline.main: Does Eating Salmon Lower The Murder Rate?
headline.kicker: THE WAY WE LIVE NOW: 4-16-06: IDEA LAB

docs.abstract: Stephen Mihm article on implications of correlation that some research has established between higher intake of omega-3 fatty acids and lower murder rates; photo (M)
docs.snippet: What omega-3 fatty acids might do for violent behavior.

docs.lead_paragraph: There is increasing evidence that a thriving international trade in smuggled poultry is helping spread bird flu, experts say.

headline.main: Bird Flu Virus May Be Spread by Smuggling
headline.print_headline: Bird Flu Virus May Be Spread By Smuggling

docs.snippet: There is increasing evidence that a thriving international trade in smuggled poultry is helping spread bird flu, experts say.
